title: Council Decision of 18 November 2014 appointing an alternate member of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for Malta
header:
22.11.2014 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 420/4
COUNCIL DECISION
of 18 November 2014
appointing an alternate member of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for Malta
2014/C 420/04
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1365/75 of 26 May 1975 on the creation of a European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions (1), and in particular Article 6 thereof,
Having regard to the lists of candidates submitted to the Council by the Governments of the Member States and by the employers' and employees' organisations,
Whereas:
(1) In its Decisions of 2 December 2013 (2) and 8 July 2014 (3), the Council appointed the members and alternate members of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for the period ending on 30 November 2016, with the exception of certain members.
(2) The employers' organisation BUSINESSEUROPE has submitted the nomination of a candidate for one post to be filled,
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed as alternate member of the Governing Board of the European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions for the period ending on 30 November 2016:
I.   REPRESENTATIVES OF EMPLOYERS' ORGANISATIONS
Country Member Alternate
Malta  Mr Joe FARRUGIA
The Council shall appoint the members and alternate members not yet nominated at a later date.
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 November 2014.
For the Council
The President
S. GOZI
(1)  OJ L 139, 30.5.1975, p. 1.
(2)  OJ C 358, 7.12.2013, p. 5.
(3)  OJ L 209, 16.7.2014, p. 54.
